name: presser
content:
presser noun [C]
(PERSON)
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone whose job is to make clothes smooth by ironing them: He worked in a dry cleaners as a presser. Scorsese's father, a clothes presser, died in 1993.
someone who makes something by pressing fruit, flowers, etc., either as a job or as a hobby: Her staff sent a batch of olives to a commercial presser. My friends include a flower presser and a sushi chef.

presser noun [C]
(MEETING)
a meeting at which a person or an organization makes a public statement and reporters can ask questions: I'll be interested to hear what he has to say in his presser. The postgame presser wasn't very well attended. Synonym
press conference
